{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# Gigamon AMX Dashboard 
---

 This dashboard provides deep observability into all traffic across Organisation's cloud, virtual and physical infrastructure."},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Network Traffic Summary
The following charts summarize the information about network traffic."},"name":"text - Summary"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### Total Application Mix"},"customWidth":"30","name":"text - Keys"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### P2P Apps seen in the network"},"customWidth":"30","name":"text - Identities"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### Presence of Cryptomining Activity"},"customWidth":"30","name":"text - Libraries"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"GigamonV2_CL 
 | summarize c=count() by app_name_s | where not(app_name_s has_any("Classification-unknown", "Unknown udp", "Unknown tcp")) | sort by c | limit 100;","size":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"icmp","label":"icmp","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"dtls","label":"Medium dtls","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"krb5","label":"krb5","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"https","label":"https","color":"blue"}]}},"customWidth":"30","name":"query - 1"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"GigamonV2_CL 
| summarize c=count() by app_name_s | where (app_name_s has_any("bittorrent", "edonkey", "slsk", "gnutella"))| sort by c | limit 100;","size":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"Low","label":"Low Severity","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"Medium","label":"Medium Serverity","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"High","label":"High Severity","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"Not Defined","color":"blue"},{"seriesName":"bittorrent","label":"bittorrent","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"edonkey","label":"edonkey","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"slsk","label":"slsk","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"gnutella","label":"gnutella","color":"redBright"}]}},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 1 - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"GigamonV2_CL 
| summarize c=count() by app_name_s | where (app_name_s has_any("bitcoin", "monero", "ethereum", "miner gate")) | sort by c | limit 100;","size":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"Low","label":"Low Severity","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"Medium","label":"Medium Serverity","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"High","label":"High Severity","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"Not Defined","color":"blue"},{"seriesName":"bitcoin","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"monero","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"ethereum","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"miner gate","color":"blue"}]}},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 1 - Copy - Copy"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### Presence of IoT Traffic"},"customWidth":"30","name":"text - CryptoState"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### Info on Expired TLS Certificates still being used"},"customWidth":"70","name":"text - QuantumState"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"GigamonV2_CL 
 | summarize c=count() by app_name_s | where (app_name_s has_any("iec104", "mqtt", "coap")) | sort by c | limit 100;","size":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"Low","label":"Low Severity","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"Medium","label":"Medium Serverity","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"High","label":"High Severity","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"Not Defined","color":"blue"},{"seriesName":"iec104","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"mqtt","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"coap","color":"redBright"}]}},"customWidth":"30","name":"Crypto - Classical"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"GigamonV2_CL 
| where isnotempty(app_name_s) and isnotempty(ssl_issuer_s) and isnotempty(ssl_common_name_s) and isnotempty(ssl_validity_not_after_s) | summarize count () by start_time_s,app_name_s,src_ip_s,dst_ip_s,ssl_issuer_s,ssl_common_name_s,ssl_validity_not_after_s | sort by app_name_s; ","size":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"icmp","label":"icmp","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"dtls","label":"Medium dtls","color":"orange"},{"seriesName":"krb5","label":"krb5","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"https","label":"https","color":"blue"}]}},"customWidth":"70","name":"PQC Chart"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable"},"name":"group - 4"}]},"name":"group - 3"}]}

Explore, analize and learn about your security posture using Gigamon AMX data connector Overview.; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Gigamon Workbook; templateRelativePath=Gigamon.json; subtitle=; provider=Gigamon}.description
Gigamon Connector data connector with template version 3.0.1

connectorUiConfig.title: Gigamon AMX Data Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Use this data connector to integrate with Gigamon Application Metadata Exporter (AMX) and get data sent directly to Microsoft Sentinel.

dataTypes.name: GigamonV2_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
GigamonV2_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
GigamonV2_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description:
1. Application Metadata Exporter (AMX) application converts the output from the Application Metadata Intelligence (AMI) in CEF format into JSON format and sends it to the cloud tools and Kafka.
 2. The AMX application can be deployed only on a V Series Node and can be connected to Application Metadata Intelligence running on a physical node or a virtual machine.
 3. The AMX application and the AMI are managed by GigaVUE-FM. This application is supported on VMware ESXi, VMware NSX-T, AWS and Azure.
instructionSteps.title: Gigamon Data Connector

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

customs.name: Microsoft Entra
customs.description: Permission to create an app registration in Microsoft Entra ID. Typically requires Entra ID Application Developer role or higher.

customs.name: Microsoft Azure
customs.description: Permission to assign Monitoring Metrics Publisher role on data collection rule (DCR). Typically requires Azure RBAC Owner or User Access Administrator role

instructionSteps.title: 1. Create ARM Resources and Provide the Required Permissions
instructionSteps.description: This connector reads data from the tables that Gigamon CCF uses in a Microsoft Analytics Workspace, if the data forwarding option is enabled in Gigamon CCF then raw event data is sent to the Microsoft Sentinel Ingestion API.

parameters.content:
#### Automated Configuration and Secure Data Ingestion with Entra Application 
Clicking on "Deploy" will trigger the creation of Log Analytics tables and a Data Collection Rule (DCR). 
It will then create an Entra application, link the DCR to it, and set the entered secret in the application. This setup enables data to be sent securely to the DCR using an Entra token.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Push your logs into the workspace
instructionSteps.description: Use the following parameters to configure the your machine to send the logs to the workspace.

parameters.label: Entra App Registration Application ID
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the App Registration Application ID

parameters.label: Entra App Registration Secret
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the App Registration Secret

parameters.label: Data Collection Endpoint Uri
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the Data Collection Endpoint Uri

parameters.label: Data Collection Rule Immutable ID
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the Data Collection Rule Immutable ID

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

Review the solution Release Notes

There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

Gigamon Application Metadata Intelligence empowers your Observability, Security Information and Event Management (SIEM), and Network Performance Monitoring tools with critical metadata attributes across thousands of business, consumer, and IT applications and services. Get deep application visibility to rapidly pinpoint performance bottlenecks, quality issues, and potential network security risks. Application Metadata Intelligence (AMI) helps you monitor and manage complex digital applications for your digital transformation initiatives. This can be achieved through the Gigamon Connector Solution by sending the AMI metadata to Microsoft Sentinel. Some benefits to highlight are Rich Actionable Insights, Boost Security Posture etc..

For more, click here

Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in Preview state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

  1. Azure Monitor HTTP Data Collector API

Data Connectors: 2, Workbooks: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
